name: Dungeon Escape 3D
description:
Dungeon Escape 3D is a game about ... escaping a dungeon!
Surprised?
Find the green glowing shrine to escape, that's it.
But I have added orcs to make it a challenge.
The ai is still buggy as hell, but it makes life difficult.
There are also some other shrines you can discover in the dungeon.

Known problems:
* Half of the features did not make it, because writing an ai for the first time is sort of difficult.
* The features that did make it are pretty unpolished.
* May have bad performance on lower spec pcs.
* Untested leveldesign (tell me if the level is currently impossible).
Anyway, I hope it's sort of playable.
I may fix any critical issus in the coming days.

I will update this post with more information and screenshots about the game as soon as I have slept enough...
